The program presents to-the-point interpretation of Chinese policies and stories that are of interest to foreign audiences, in a style they are familiar with.

programme.title: Big Story
programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling. The program provides a unique platform for the best current affairs documentaries from around the globe. Big Story aims to present the contemporary world and China’s global perspectives on the contemporary world to an international audience.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of CGTN, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, Nairobi and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world’s top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.

programme.title: The World Today

The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.

programme.title: Sports Scene
programme.desc: Sports Scene brings you closer to all the action from all corners of the world, with highlights from across Europe, North America and China's top sports leagues. We examine the changes and growth in China's domestic leagues, as the country undergoes an incredible economic transformation.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: Inheritors
programme.desc: Inheritors is a multi-media product from CGTN that shines a light on China’s rich Intangible Cultural Heritage. programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. CGTN’s Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.

programme.title: Asia Today
programme.desc: Asia Today highlights the latest news and social developments across Asia. Correspondents in over a dozen countries report on the region’s top stories as they happen. Analysts bring Asian perspective to topical and developing issues. Asia Today also emphasizes the diverse cultures and lifestyles of the world’s most populous continent.

programme.title: Leaders Talk

programme.title: FIGHT SPORTS MMA Nkazimulo Zulu vs. Jake Hadley
programme.desc: This episode features a flyweight championship bout as Jake Hadley takes on the veteran Nkazimulo Zulu. Bonus coverage includes Mutuale Basambombo vs. HP Van Staden and Christian Bobo vs. Adrian Sanchez.

programme.title: WCCB Marco Huck vs. Hugo Hernan Garay
programme.desc: With the WBO Cruiserweight World Championship on the line, titleholder Marco Huck (33-1) defends against veteran contender Hugo Garay (34-6) at the Olympia Eissportzentrum in Munich, Germany. Huck, fighting in his adoptive home country, was making the 7th consecutive defense of his championship.

programme.title: WCCB Firat Arslan vs. Yoan Pablo Hernandez
programme.desc: From the Messehall in Erfurt, Germany, IBF Cruiserweight World Champion Yoan Pablo Hernandez looks to defend his title for the fourth time, taking on former WBA Cruiserweight World Champion Firat Arslan. Hernandez comes into this bout having won fourteen straight fights, including recent back to back victories over former champion Steve Cunningham.

programme.title: Miami Finals: Part 1
programme.desc: Thirty finalists return to Miami with a chance to land one of 15 spots in Las Vegas. In addition to the qualifying round's 6 obstacles, athletes must tackle 4 additional challenges--including the all-new Minefield!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Juan Manuel Marquez vs. Michael Katsidis
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is a highly-praised and hard-hitting lightweight championship fight featuring Juan Manuel Marquez and Michael Katsidis that was named HBO's 2010 Fight of the Year. Also on the card, welterweight champion Victor Ortiz.

programme.title: Fukuoka, Japan Episode 5
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Episode 5 from Fukuoka, Japan.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Floyd Mayweather Jr vs. Oscar De La Hoya
programme.desc: This episode features the WBC World super welterweight title between Floyd Mayweather, Jr. and Oscar De La Hoya that made $165 million in total gross revenue, making it the richest fight ever, as well as kickboxing, sumo and more!

programme.title: Pariah: Sonny Liston
programme.desc: Was Sonny Liston murdered? This four-part documentary series explores the life and untimely death of boxing legend Charles 'Sonny' Liston, who became the heavyweight champion of the world when he knocked out Floyd Patterson in 1962. Unfortunately, just eight years later, he was found dead in his Las Vegas home from an alleged heroin overdose. Suspicion regarding the real cause of his death has continued to this day. Episode 3 of 4.

programme.title: WCCB Tina Rupprecht vs. Eri Matsuda
programme.desc: Ffrom Heidelberg, Germany, a championship tripleheader takes place headlined by Tina Rupprecht of Germany and Eri Matsuda of Japan competing for the WBC and WBO Women's Atomweight World Championships. Also on the card will be undefeated World Champion Sumire Yamanaka, also of Japan, defending the IBF Atomweight World Title against Fabiana Bytyqi. Rounding out the card will a European Heavyweight Title clash featuring Oleksandr Zakhozhyi against Arnold Gjergjaj.Only on FIGHT SPORTS.

programme.title: Rabat 2023 - Episode 2
programme.desc: Rabat, Morocco welcomes one of the most anticipated events in Martial Arts this year as the Karate 1 Premier League returns. The last edition of Karate 1 Premier League in Rabat saw nearly 200 athletes from 44 countries participating in this event, one of the most prestigious in the world of Karate. The World Karate Federation expects another tremendous turnout, featuring Olympic medalists and world-ranked competitors, when the Karate 1 Premier League is back in Rabat, Morocco.

programme.title: Wide World of Fights Daniel Ponce De Leon vs. Antonio Escalante
programme.desc: Wide World Of Fights includes all styles of fighting from around the world in one show! This episode features a featherweight battle that ends in a brutal knockout between Daniel Ponce De Leon and Antonio Escalante, as well as kickboxing, sumo, arm wrestling and more!

programme.title: KNOCKOUTS! Shane Mosley vs. Ricardo Mayorga
programme.desc: The main event in this episode is "Sugar" Shane Mosley facing Ricardo Mayorga in a light middleweight title fight, the first of two bouts between the two, that features an exciting last-minute finish. Also on the card, action from former champs Juan Manuel Marquez and Juan Diaz.

programme.title: Nagoya, Japan: Show 1
programme.desc: For the first time the top ranked sumo competitors in the world are featured in an action packed series, FIGHT SPORTS GRAND SUMO. This new format presents Sumo in an authentic, in-depth and entertaining way covering the rules, ranks, match-ups, and more. Show 1 featuring Harumafuji, Kotooshu, Goeido and Kotoshogiku from the Nagoya basho, 2015.

programme.desc: This episode features highlights from the CMX Weapons Championship and the Men's Forms Championship at the ISKA US Open Championships held at Disney World, Orlando, FL, USA.

programme.title: MEGA Fights Antonio Margarito vs. Paul Williams
programme.desc: MEGA Fights are premiere events from the sport of boxing including HBO World Championship Boxing and historic PPV events plus past, current and future World Champions. This episode features a WBO welterweight championship bout between 8-time defending champ Antonio Margarito, aka 'El Tornado de Tijuana' (34-4, 24 KOs) and undefeated Paul 'The Punisher' Williams (32-0, 24 KOs) from the Home Depot Center in Carson, California, USA, on July 14, 2007.

programme.title: Saturday Encore Presentation Sara Bailey vs. Evelin Bermudez
programme.desc: LIVE September 21st from the Hard Rock Casino in Ottawa, Canada, undefeated WBA Light Flyweight World Champion Sara Bailey of Ontario and IBF/WBO Light Flyweight World Champion Evelin Bermudez of Argentina meet to unify the titles. Bailey claimed her title in just her fourth professional fight defeating Guadalupe Bautista, and Bermudez became a two-time champion when beating Tania Enriquez before two successful defenses.

programme.title: Chael Sonnen, Matt Serra, Clay Guida and more!
programme.desc: This episode follows former UFC welterweight champion Matt Serra around his hometown in New Jersey for a look at the lighter side of this intense competitor. Ring girl Natasha Wicks shows us that the fighters aren't the only ones with the big guns. Plus a behind the scenes look at the UFC Fan Expo and an interview with MMA legend Chael Sonnen.

programme.title: Girl Power
programme.desc: Invite stylish men from all over the world to share cultural differences, feelings and values, and life experiences with Taiwanese!

programme.title: Hello Doctor
programme.desc: The program invites doctors from different fields to talk about big and small things about doctors, break the stereotype of doctors and provide audiences with information on medical health from a relaxed and pleasant perspective!

programme.desc: Laura takes the reigns alone in Fullerton, and proceeds to outsell Dan. Brandi gets assaulted by her locker but ultimately drives home a winner. Rene postpones a day date in favour of a 'work date'.

programme.desc: The units are packed full in Stanton, as Darrell has to deal with Kimber's eyes on a competitor. Ivy brings a full truck, hoping for a second haul. Dusty unpacks what could be the ultimate assistant.

programme.title: China's Extreme Skywalker
programme.desc: Dubbed the Prince of Tightrope Walking and holder of six world records, an ethnic Uighur man pushes the limits and performs without safety equipments.

programme.title: Taiwan Amphibious Recon Unit
programme.desc: We follow new recruits in the 139th batch of frogmen as they enter the final and hardest part of training: 'hell week', 6 days of non-stop continuous brutal exercises where only the toughest will survive.

programme.title: Amulets Of The Chosen
programme.desc: The Philippines is home to mystical amulets used to lead revolutions, endure wars and rise up against colonial invaders. Passed down from ancient ancestors, how could they have acquired such powers?

programme.title: Shapeshifters Of Java
programme.desc: Why do so many cultures across the world tell stories of people who can transform into animals? Could they have their roots in lost human abilities? Keys to unravelling this mystery could lie in Indonesia.

programme.title: Curse Of The Carrier
programme.desc: The team dives in search of an A3 Skywarrior attack aircraft that was lost in a suspicious disaster off the USS Saratoga aircraft carrier in 1960. The Saratoga lost eight men on this single mission.

programme.title: Episode 2 (Eng/Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: A charismatic and hardworking hawker , Mr Joseph has a very personal touch to his business style however he faces a stiff competition from other stalls to keep his business going. Will #teamudayam be able to help him overcome it? Don't miss it!

programme.title: (PG) Episode 2 (Eng/Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: A senior known for relentlessly ragging juniors becomes the target of a secret plan devised by the hostel boys determined to make him stop. However, what begins as a bold stand against bullying unexpectedly unfolds into a heartbreaking experience for everyone.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 12 (Eng/Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: Pestle and Mortar dives into the immersive experience of preparing staples in the most authentic means possible, a culinary experience like never before. It is a cooking shows that brings the audience onto roads less travelled. Each week brings the audience to exotic destinations with their own culture, stories, festivals and needless to say, epicurean ensemble. Back to basics-No more gas stoves and buying fish from the markets, pick up your firewood and start the fire!

programme.title: (PG) Episode 11 (Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: Later weeks, Madhan takes Suseela on a dinner date, and he confesses his love to her. She rejects him. Madhan feels defeated and he recollects his past memories with his ex- wife.Madhan is seen leaving for school.On the ride, he notices a girl whose beauty immediately captures his attention. He tries to find out more about her with the help of his friend Kelvin. He discovers that the girl, named Angeline, has recently transferred to his school.

programme.title: Episode 13 (Eng/Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: Travel through your palette with Gama Gama, a brand-new cooking show focused on taking you on a sensory journey around the globe. Watch as our chefs whip up never before seen fusion dishes as cultures collide in a marriage of flavours. What's more? We bring to you spice hacks that will level-up your home remedy game, all from the comforts of your kitchen. So follow the aromatic trail and let's go on an adventure.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3
programme.desc: Love, Secrets, Betrayal but in all light Sundaram Kudumbathinar is one family that will make you eventually say One for all and All for One!

programme.desc: Love, Secrets, Betrayal but in all light Sundaram Kudumbathinar is one family that will make you eventually say One for all and All for One!

programme.title: (PG) The Ties that Bind Us (Eng/Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: Nila decides to go against destiny to give Prabu a second chance, ready to risk everything she has worked for, despite Sreemanthi's attempts to dissuade her. As Prabu regains consciousness, he finds comfort in the presence of George Kutty, Mama, and Deepa. Plagued by an overwhelming emptiness, Prabu embarks on his journey to recovery, in preparation for the next chapter in his life with Deepa.

programme.title: (PG) Crossroads of Consequences (Finale) (Eng/Tam Subtitles)
programme.desc: An amazing opportunity arises at Prabu's workplace to visit an overseas museum for research. Landing in Switzerland, he tours the museum, feeling an intense, inexplicable connection to it. As he struggles to unravel his emotions, he encounters a woman standing precariously on a bridge. After spending an unforgettable day together with her, Prabu finally uncovers the missing piece that fills the void in his life.

programme.title: Squirrel Babies
programme.desc: Spring has sprung! There are cute baby animals to meet and frolic with.

programme.desc: Spot the odd one out or guess who lives here. A great memory tip from Duggee, an edition of The Agony and Eggstacy, and how to draw Enid - down to her last whisker.

programme.title: Rain
programme.desc: When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Pizza Girls
programme.desc: Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Driving
programme.desc: With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Feeling Better
programme.desc: It's time to wake up but Tinky Winky isn't feeling well. Soon, Tinky Winky feels better but now Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po don't feel well.

programme.title: Safari Party
programme.desc: Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing on safari.

programme.title: Frog Pond
programme.desc: Hooper makes a new froggy friend called Croaksie. But when Hooper realises his new pal needs a home, Hooper tries to find a way to make him one before he hops off.

programme.title: Dog Loves Record Breakers
programme.desc: Pug wants to break a world record. Dog suggests they go to the North Pole so that Pug can be the first pug to reach the Pole.

programme.title: Okidoasis
programme.desc: Messy is thirsty for an adventure, so he goes to OKIDO to help his friends solve the mystery of the dried-up oasis.

programme.title: Messy Music
programme.desc: Messy and friends must play the OKIDO concert. It's time for OKIDO to make some noise.

programme.title: Daydreamer Monty
programme.desc: Monty is dreaming up fantastical ways to get the new piano upstairs, but his family tell him that daydreaming won't help solve real problems.

programme.title: It's Time to Make a Sorrel Drink
programme.desc: JoJo & Gran Gran make Sorrel drinks together, and JoJo comes up with her own recipe that uses her favourite ingredients.

programme.title: It's Time to Find Monty's Ball
programme.desc: When Monty loses his favourite ball, JoJo & Gran Gran decide to help him find it! At first, it's tricky to find, but then Gran Gran has a plan to get onto Monty's level.

programme.title: Seacow Snow Trail
programme.desc: Sarah and Duck are keen to find out who delivered their Christmas presents to them.

programme.title: Origami Overload
programme.desc: John has a problem with the origami flamingos he has made and needs Sarah and Duck's help.

programme.title: Gordon and Rebecca - Coming Through!
programme.desc: Gordon and Rebecca do the same work, but go about it differently, and when Rebecca tries to be more like Gordon, it doesn't go well.

programme.desc: Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.desc: Supertato and the Tato Team must battle to save Tato Tower from Evil Pea's earth-shaking stomping performance at the Veg-O-Vision Song Contest.

programme.title: Movie - Ponniyin Selvan 2
programme.desc: In the wake of his brother Ponniyin Selvan's presumed death, Aditha Karikalan of the Chola dynasty rallies his kingdom and tries to resist threats on all sides.

programme.title: Movie - Dharmam Vellum
programme.desc: Dharmam Vellum is a 1989 Tamil-language action crime film written, produced and directed by K. Rangaraj.

programme.title: Movie - Ullam
programme.desc: Raja, an introvert, falls in love with Kavitha, who has helped him to become an extrovert. Things turn chaotic when Raja comes to know about Kavitha's dark past.

programme.title: Movie - Unarchigal
programme.desc: Amruta's father struggles to find a suitable match for her, which is tough because of an astrological flaw in her zodiac. When she finally gets married, the groom steals her jewellery and abandons her on the first night.

programme.title: Fillers
programme.desc: KTV HD presents you round-the-clock Kollywood movies, from the latest blockbusters to classics of the yesteryear!

programme.title: Movie - Thenkasi Pattinam
programme.desc: Kannan is in love with his childhood friend Meenakshi, but keeps it a secret from his beloved friend Das. However, the friendship between them is ruined as Das falls in love with the same girl.

programme.title: Movie - Kanne Kaniyamudhe
programme.desc: Kanne Kaniyamude is a Tamil movie directed by Kannan Sakthi, with Raghuman and Amala playing the lead roles.

programme.title: Movie - Puthu Manithan
programme.desc: Kabali, a fisherman who is both revered and dreaded, falls for Suganthi, a chorus singer, and tries to woo her. When he is about to declare his love, she announces her marriage.

programme.title: Movie - Agni Natchathiram
programme.desc: Two stepsons of an honest noble man choose different professions. One becomes a police office and the other turns into a goon. The rest of the film revolves around how the two confront each other.

programme.title: Movie - Endhiran
programme.desc: Vaseegaran, a brilliant scientist, builds Chitti, a unique robot programmed to protect mankind and also feel human emotions. Problems arise when Chitti falls in love with his girlfriend.

programme.title: Movie - Ennavale
programme.desc: Lakshmi, a landlord's daughter, encourages James, a struggling singer, to gain recognition. However when James proposes to her, Lakshmi turns him down due to her bitter past.

programme.title: Women's Rugby World Cup 2025: Canada vs England (Live)
programme.desc: The 2025 Women's Rugby World Cup will be the tenth edition of the women's Rugby World Cup, and is scheduled to take place in England between 22 August and 27 September 2025.

programme.title: Lady Flower Fist
programme.desc: Mui Tsui Fa (Kwan Wing Ho) met Fong Tak (Kong Wa), the richest man in Guangzhou, when she visited her father. They had some misunderstandings and were against each other. Then, Fa offended the General and she had to marry Tak to avoid being punished. Fa, in becoming Tak‘s fourth concubine, aroused jealousy and hate in Tak’s house._x000D__x000D_The Tso Sect leader held a contest to seek a husband for his daugher, Siu Wan (Chan Siu Ha). Fa won the match in a man‘s disguise.

programme.title: Fate of The Clairvoyant
programme.desc: Pui (Amy Chan) was a dutiful wife and mother. She devoted all her time to her family and didn’t realize her unattractive outlook was driving her husband away. She was shocked when she discovered her husband, Wo (Keung Tai Wai), was having an affair with the sexy movie star, Ling (Valerie Chow). Her heart broke when Wo asked for a divorce._x000D__x000D_Pui’s confidence was badly shattered.

programme.title: Go With The Float
programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

programme.desc: Former stuntman Hung Sap-yat (Wayne Lai) hooks up with his buddies, who are also former film crew members, Chung Chi-wai (Willie Wai), Fong Sum (Wong Yee Kam), Lee Sai-fong (Timothy Cheng) and Ng Kam-yin (Jimmy Au) as they want to organize a retrospective for Sap-yat’s late wife Miu Miu (Mimi Kung). They reminisce about the old days. The chums even regroup and shoot a movie based on a completed screenplay entitled Flying Skill from yesteryear.

programme.title: Pillow Case Of Mystery, A
programme.desc: SZE SAI LUN (Au Yeung Chun Wah, Bobby), the magistrate of Jiangdu County once makes a mistake, making an innocent person taking its own life by hanging. Since then, LUN loses his faith in himself and his will is down. Later by chance, LUN obtains a Dream-pillow. Whenever he comes across any difficult cases, the Pillow-spirit (Lo Hoi Pang) will appear in his dream and present him the puzzle that holds the key to crack the case.

programme.title: Cold Blood Warm Heart
programme.desc: Bong (Adam Cheng) blamed Sing (Kwan Hoi San) for abandoning his mother and refused to acknowledge him as his father even he was one of the richest men in town. He loved and admired his foster father Kin (Bow Fong), who was a retired cop. He and his brother Lap (Gallen Lo) followed Kin’s footsteps and joined the force.

There, Fung met a girl named Hung (Faye Wong), whom he had faint memory of her saving him twenty years ago. Yet he was astonished as Hung looked the same without aging a bit. Since then, his mind was preoccupied with Hung.

programme.title: My Sister of Eternal Flower
programme.desc: FA LAI-CHU (Charmaine Sheh) is a kindhearted and innocent woman with the IQ of a ten-year-old. When her parents passed away, she shouldered the responsibility for the care of her younger sister and brother.

programme.title: Forensic Heroes IV
programme.desc: Senior Chemist of Forensic Science Division Ko On (Raymond Wong), Senior Forensic Pathologist Man Ka-hei (Selena Lee) and Kowloon West Regional Crime Unit Senior Inspector Kwok Fai-wong (Shaun Tam) are the pillars of Crime Busting Trio leading a team of outstanding individuals. They unravel appalling schemes by using advanced forensic science. Their mastery of pathology enables them to decode secrets of the human anatomy.

programme.title: Wax and Wane
programme.desc: YUNG SHING-FUN (Lau Siu Ming) and his cousin MAN WING-CHEONG (Chow Chung) have been at odds for years over the trade name right of a noodle shop. YUNG YI-TSUN (Kwok Tsun On), FUN’s eldest son, is engaging in a property developing project. Not entirely willingly, he offers to buy out the location of CHEONG’s noodle shop with his company’s shares. He also invites CHEONG and his son, MAN KA-FUNG (Chan Kam Hung), to join the company’s management.

programme.title: Bisaku Hanya Mencintaimu, Mas Sosis
programme.desc: Nela ran away from home and moved into a boarding house to avoid an arranged marriage by her parents. However, Nela felt uncomfortable because the boarding house room she was staying in was close to Dito's chicken coop. This often led to arguments between Nela and Dito. Actually, Dito is a master's program student. However, he chose to start a business selling viral sausage instead of working in an office like his brother, Fito.

programme.title: Cinta Karena Cinta
programme.desc: 15 years ago, Jenar found himself in a tragic event that claimed the lives of his family. Mila, who is Jenar's older sister, is still alive after Ayu's adoption. Jenar's life changes after meeting Mirza, a man who is attracted to her.

programme.title: Tutorial Ajak Nikah Jalur Express
programme.desc: An older sister who is seriously ill and has to take care of her only child because her husband is irresponsible. She asks her younger sister, Zahra, and her friend, Andika, to get married in front of her while she is sick so that they can take care of her niece.

programme.title: Samudra Cinta
programme.desc: The love story between Ocean and Cinta, which had always quarreled before. Gradually, they became friends and slowly grew in love between them. But a secret between the Cinta family and the Samudra family makes their relationship complicated because there is a big secret about Cinta that can ruin their relationship.

programme.title: Love Story The Series S2
programme.desc: Kendra's meeting with Maudy began with an accidental meeting at the Villa, that's where Ken first saw Maudy and immediately fell in love. At first Maudy was disturbed by Ken's presence, the horse Maudy was riding accidentally got angry and fell into the river, not long after Ken jumped to save Maudy.

programme.title: Bisaku Hanya Mencintaimu, Mas Sosis

programme.title: ANAK BAND
programme.desc: Cahaya, who was trading with his vegetable cart, felt like he got a durian collapse when suddenly Gilang, the vocalist of The Junas, Cahaya's favorite band, ran up to Cahaya asking for help so that Cahaya helped him avoid the pursuit of his fans. Light, who was kind and always optimistic, happily helped Gilang hide. Once safe, Gilang came out of hiding and thanked Light. Light was very happy because it turned out that Gilang was very friendly.

programme.title: Bidan Desa Penuh Cinta
programme.desc: Rara is a midwife in a village. In an incident, Rara meets Gigih, a vegetable seller. When Rara has a patient who wants to give birth, Rara stops Gigih, who is on his way to the market. Gigih is very upset with Rara because they have met twice in incidents that have annoyed him. One day, Gigih's parents fall ill and need to be examined immediately. Despite still being angry with Rara, Gigih reluctantly asks her to check on his mother's condition.

programme.desc: Joko is a new doctor assigned to work in Rina's village. The longer Joko stays in Rina's village, the more often he meets Rina. programme.title: Bodyguard Cantik Bikin Hati Nggak Kuat
programme.desc: Jamilah inherited a power that is only passed down to the women in her family. Unlike ordinary women, Jamilah can do heavy work. But Jamilah can only use her power for good and must not reveal it to others. Because of her magical power, which is passed down from her family, Jamilah cannot live a normal life. Jamilah's fate suddenly takes a dramatic turn when a young boss named Reno discovers her secret.

programme.title: CINTA AMARA
programme.desc: An engineered tragedy left 6-month-old Aziza separated from her mother. However, the baby was rescued by her grandfather and taken as far away as possible, so that her granddaughter would have no further contact with the Nirwan family, the kayakers who own a famous bakery company. Burhan, the baby's grandfather entrusted his granddaughter to his confidant, whose wife was pregnant.

programme.title: PL Preview 2025/26
programme.desc: We look ahead to Newcastle v Arsenal at St James’ Park, Spurs’ clash with Wolves and Nottingham Forest hosting Sunderland.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Arsenal have won two of their last four league meetings with Manchester City (D2), as many as their previous 22 beforehand (D5 L15). The Gunners could win back-to-back league games against the Citizens for the first time since December 2015.

programme.title: PL Stories 2025/26
programme.desc: Maya Yoshida quietly became one of the Premier League’s most dependable defenders during his years at Southampton, but his influence reached far beyond the pitch. In this episode, we look back at Yoshida’s journey from Japan to England’s top-flight, his role as a leader for club and country, and the cultural bridge he helped build along the way.

programme.title: The Big Interview 2025/26
programme.desc: Six Premier League Titles, Four League Cups, Two FA Cups, a Champions League medal and 96 caps for England. Few players can boast a footballing CV like Kyle Walker. After eight years at Manchester City and a year in Italy with AC Milan, Walker is back in the Premier League with newly promoted Burnley. This week, Walker sits down with The Big Interview to reflect on his time at the Eithad ahead of returning as a visitor.

programme.title: Fantasy Show 2025/26
programme.desc: Haaland or Salah? Saka or Palmer? Isak or Cunha? Picking your Fantasy team is never easy, but the Fantasy Show is on hand to help FPL Managers with those big decisions.

programme.desc: We look ahead to Newcastle v Arsenal at St James’ Park, Spurs’ clash with Wolves and Nottingham Forest hosting Sunderland.

programme.desc: Manchester United are unbeaten in their last 12 Premier League home games against Chelsea (W5 D7) since a 0-1 defeat in May 2013.

programme.title: Premier League 2025/26 (4K)
programme.desc: Manchester United are winless in their last seven away Premier League matches (D2 L5) since a 3-0 win at Leicester in March. The Red Devils last had a longer run without an away win between March and October 2019 (eight games).

programme.desc: Crystal Palace have won just one of their last 16 Premier League meetings with Liverpool (D3 L12), winning 1-0 at Anfield in April 2024. The Eagles haven’t scored more than once in any of their last 12 league games against the Reds (6 goals).

programme.desc: Mahima, a devotee of Goddess Santoshi, falls in love with Anuraag and the two get married. However, her in-laws are hostile towards her so she decides to win them over through love and hard work. Release Year: 2006 Director: Ahmed Siddiqui

programme.title: English Vinglish
programme.desc: 2013 film about a housewife who enrols in an English-speaking course to stop her husband and daughter mocking her lack of English skills, and gains self-respect in the process. Release Year: 2012 Director: Gauri Shinde Awards: Zee Cine Awards- Best Debuting Director- Gauri Shinde , Stardust Awards- Best ActreSS in Drama- Sri Devi, NDTV Indian of the Year, IN- Entertainer of the Year- Sri Devi

programme.title: Batti Gul Meter Chalu
programme.desc: The lives of three childhood friends, SK, Lalita and Sundar, take a shocking turn after Sundar's printing press receives an extremely inflated electricity bill. Release Year: 2018 Director: Shree Narayan Singh

programme.title: Blank
programme.desc: A suicide bomber loses his memory and has a bomb attached to his heart. It is up to the police officers to prevent this bomb from taking innocent lives. Release Year: 2019 Director: Behzad Khambata

programme.title: PARA PENCARI TUHAN 15
programme.desc: Bang Jack plans to build a special boarding school for the elderly. Bang Jack is assisted by his assistant named Habib. Habib is a handsome young man who becomes the child of one of the students.

programme.title: BUMI CENDRAWASIH PAPUA
programme.desc: Ikhsan intends to work in the city, but the city dwellers annoy him with their arrogant behavior. Ikhsan is forced to return to work at his father Mawar's cattle farm. Mawar is madly in love with Ikhsan.

programme.title: Ditiup Kamu Bikin Cenat-Cenut
programme.desc: The story revolves around the life of a man named Bastian (Cakrawala Airawan). Bastian is a spoiled young man who has recently fallen into poverty after his family's business went bankrupt. He is currently searching for a job. One day, Bastian accidentally collides with Maesaroh (Shanice Margaretha), who was walking while carrying a food container. Bastian quickly helps Maesaroh, ensuring her food container remains intact. Accidentally, Bastian and Maesaroh end up hugging each other.

programme.title: Hard to Heart S4
programme.desc: Musim terbaru yang lebih hangat bersama artis tersohor, mengenai jatuh bangun mereka dalam sepanjang terbabit dengan kerjaya seni tempatan.

programme.title: Extreme Roadtrip

programme.title: Stella On Stage

programme.title: Stella On Stage

programme.title: Stella On Stage

programme.title: Stella On Stage
programme.desc: Stella menyerang Ema memenangi anugerah dengan lagu Uncle Reza yang sepatutnya dinyanyikan oleh Stella. Nik berhasrat untuk mengahwini Hannah. Namun bertindak memutuskan hubungan mereka.

programme.title: From KL to PL

programme.desc: A chivalrous doctor, having faced death, is devoted to carrying on his father's humanitarian spirit of helping the world. Educated in the West yet passionate about Chinese traditions, he provides free treatment to one patient after another abandoned by Western medicine.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: Hung Shu-Kan owns a logistics business. The only thing on his mind is the well-being of his three daughters. His eldest daughter has moved abroad, but his second youngest daughter, Yuek-Shui, is still single. She and her little sister Sum-Yue often squabble, putting their father in a dilemma.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Legend of Two Sisters in the Chaos
programme.desc: During the Later Zhou dynasty, the Fu family becomes the focus of attention when a prophecy states that one of their daughters will become empress. This leads to people assuming that by destroying the Fu sisters, they will also destroy the throne.

programme.title: Big City Shop 2024
programme.desc: Big City Shop introduces viewers to the latest products on fashion, skin care, make-up, health care, baby care and much more! The hosts will demonstrate and try on the products, and also invite related experts to share their knowledge.

programme.title: Happy Old Buddies
programme.desc: This show brings on doctors and Chinese medicine practitioners to discuss diseases that the elderly should pay attention to, and provide prevention and treatment methods.

programme.title: Osaka Unlock
programme.desc: After experiencing Tokyo, Japanese travel expert Helen To explores Osaka, which is also loved by the Hong Kong people.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Good Morning Hong Kong
programme.desc: Good Morning Hong Kong brings you the latest news that matter to you.

programme.title: Deep in the Realm of Conscience
programme.desc: Set during the Tang dynasty, drama follows Prince of Ping, Princess Taiping, and their confidants as they vie for control of the imperial court, exposing layers of jealousy, betrayal and ambition amid the backdrop of court intrigue.

programme.title: Partners' Kitchen
programme.desc: Star artists and chefs become kitchen partners to take part in this cooking competition! The programme tracks the artists' practice, from entering a professional kitchen to learning to cook, understanding the skills and essence of the dishes along the way.

programme.title: Hands Up
programme.desc: This children's programme encourages children to ask questions, express themselves, and move towards their goals!

programme.title: Lord of Shanghai
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Shanghai, this drama depicts the turbulent rise and rivalry of three powerful business tycoons who start off as friends, but become fierce enemies amid political chaos and personal betrayal.

programme.title: Lord of Shanghai
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Shanghai, this drama depicts the turbulent rise and rivalry of three powerful business tycoons who start off as friends, but become fierce enemies amid political chaos and personal betrayal.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: The body of the urban dweller is prone to problems. Vital Lifeline deconstructs your health. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of various diseases, as well as physical therapists and sports therapists to teach appropriate exercises.

programme.title: Mayanne Blah Blah Blah
programme.desc: In this talk show, host Mayanne invites artistes and guests to openly discuss various bold and unconventional Hong Kong topics. What worries plump women? Do men become useless when they reach middle age? Can live streaming really help supplement income?

programme.title: ChatSAT
programme.desc: Teenagers are keen on trends. Stepping into the era of technology, they are particularly interested in emerging electronic products and popular media. Our hosts collect the newest information from all over the world, sharing their discoveries with viewers each week.

programme.title: The Sound Of Talents
programme.desc: TVB's all-new large-scale singing competition aims to discover the next generation of music stars, targeting passionate and talented individuals aged 16 to 30 from around the world.

programme.title: George Lam & Sally Yeh - Duet for Life
programme.desc: TVB Jade brings you endless entertainment with concurrent dramas and sitcoms, as well as the latest news, variety and infotainment programmes from TVB.

programme.title: JSG Billboard 2025
programme.desc: Count down to the top 20 songs on JSG Billboard every episode!

programme.title: Tokyo Unlock (Sr.2)
programme.desc: Tokyo Unlock aims to provide viewers with fresh insights into Tokyo's vibrant urban landscape and suburban delights through engaging on-the-ground adventures.

programme.title: Roadside Station Guide XIII
programme.desc: Wong You Nam and Chloe Leung take you to explore 13 roadside stations in the Kanto region of Japan, featuring local specialties, culture and scenic spots. Embark on an immersive journey through unique travel experiences at these popular rest stops along Japanese highways.

programme.title: ChatSAT
programme.desc: Teenagers are keen on trends. Stepping into the era of technology, they are particularly interested in emerging electronic products and popular media. Our hosts collect the newest information from all over the world, sharing their discoveries with viewers each week.

programme.title: Gourmet Express
programme.desc: Hong Kong is home to gourmet food from all over the world. Our food anchors and hosts keep up with the latest foodie information and offers, gaining an in-depth understanding of the stories behind the taste.

programme.title: News At 18:30
programme.desc: Bringing you the news from Hong Kong, the mainland and around the world every evening at 6:30pm.

programme.title: News Magazine 2025
programme.desc: A weekly special report on different Hong Kong and international headlines.

programme.title: Scoop 2025
programme.desc: This programme goes hot on the heels of the biggest happenings in society and the entertainment scene, bringing you the latest scoops.

programme.title: Amazing Cut (Sr.2)
programme.desc: This reality competition showcases the creativity and talent of Hong Kong's top fashion designers. Eleven contestants face a series of design challenges, creating original works for local celebrities and competing for the championship.

programme.title: Mighty Baby
programme.desc: Designers Johnny, Wayne and Lena are tasked with developing a revolutionary line of baby products. Complicated by Wayne's fear of babies and the arrival of child behaviour expert Boey, the team faces humorous mishaps as they try to complete their project.

programme.title: The Most Beautiful Villages In Japan
programme.desc: While some small towns in Japan with populations of less than 10,000 are developing, local residents still carefully protect the unique customs and customs of their hometown. We travel through Gifu Prefecture, Nagano Prefecture and Hokkaido to explore Japan's most beautiful villages.

programme.title: JSG Billboard 2025
programme.desc: Count down to the top 20 songs on JSG Billboard every episode!

programme.title: News Roundup
programme.desc: A round-up of the news before the day ends.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 13 (Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 2 -Respiratory Illness - Asthma, Smoking (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: This week, the doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT, Haizad Imran and Suzairhe Sumari, along with the panel of experts and celebrity will discuss about the respiratory system. What are the health issues related to our respiratory system? What are the functions of our lungs? How does smoking affects the lungs? What are the symptoms of chronic respiratory diseases?

programme.title: (PG) Episode 36 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Humaira finds out that she is pregnant and wishes to give the baby up for adoption as she starts getting nightmares. Faza and Diana gets engaged but she has doubts of getting married.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 39 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Iris panics and calls Firman when she is lost in Ijora. Violet asks Lara to stop speculating when Lara reminds her of who Aidan's priority is.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 6
programme.desc: Adi, 28, has been wheelchair-bound since an accident which happened when he was 10. As a young kid, he remembers vaguely about the accident but could not recall the exact details as he had amnesia for about 4 months after the accident. His dad, Khairi had left the family for another woman two months before. Khairi's parents and siblings who were against him marrying Salina, a former waitress, had reasons to celebrate. Instead of providing family support to Salina, they distanced themselves away.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 12 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Mel makes a drastic decision which her mother disapproves. Shah gets more frustrated with Tipez and Rosie becomes more suspicious of him. While Wiwik is busy with Idah’s new business, Ramli gives Wiwik a surprise. Susi enforces her power in Kepindo.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 9 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Tells the story about a girl named Alesha who does not get the love of a mother. After a few years, Alesha was taken to Jakarta with her grandmother, Masitoh.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 5 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: The Zoom series is known as a riveting travel series where a dynamic duo of hosts begins an unforgettable adventure, delving into the history, culture, natural wonders, and culinary delights of a new country. From the bustling streets of ancient cities to the serene beauty of hidden landscapes, they uncover the stories and traditions that define each place.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 5 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: Ashraf came up with a malicious plan for Khadijah to marry Dayyan. Khadijah is stuck as she is worried over her pregnancy. Aishah is annoyed that she is treated as the helper at home.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 20
programme.desc: Riz wants to introduce Ara to Eliza but Eliza has to rush off to fly and join Raizal for business. Ara yearns to reconcile with her mother.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 13 (Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: (Dual language Malay and English) Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 3 -Gout & Arthritis (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: What is the difference between gout and arthritis? If one is suffering from gout, are there any types of food they they have to avoid? Join Haizad Imran and Suzairhe Sumari at SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT medical hub, along with a panel of experts and celebrities as they discuss on the symptoms and causes of Gout and Arthritis. Also, get to know the types of treatments that can be done.

programme.title: (PG) Episode 37 (Eng/Mal Subtitles)

programme.title: (PG) (Eng/Mal Subtitles)
programme.desc: In a lucky draw contest, Aidil is selected to win a five-day, four-night stay in a five-star hotel and a cash prize of five thousand ringgit. He gives the cash and tickets to Pak Karim, who is reluctant to accept the offer, concerned about leaving his beloved chicken.

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Three years after Mike retires from his stripper life, the Kings of Tampa reunite one last time to bring the house down with their muscles and moves.

programme.title: North Country
programme.desc: A single mother retaliates against her male co-workers in an iron mine, leading to the first class-action lawsuit for sexual discrimination in America.

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: After being abandoned at the altar by his sweetheart, wedding singer Adam Sandler is jaded by love until he meets a waitress played by Drew Barrymore.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.desc: A truck driver finds a young Mexican American girl inside his shipping container and his life takes a turn as he tries to reunite her with her family.

programme.desc: Free-spirited teenager Amanda Bynes brings a breath of fresh air to the stuffy world of her long-lost father, Colin Firth.

programme.title: Made In Taiwan
programme.desc: "Made In Taiwan" records the rich and diverse history and humanities, local specialties, natural landscapes, as well as special ecology, plant research and other natural ecology, character close-ups, mountain scenery and etc., as the "Made In Taiwan" theme content. Expecting the viewing of the movie for nearly an hour is a rhythm and fresh, like a cloud and flowing water, which makes the viewers moved and harvests a rich intellectual journey.

programme.title: Kangsi Coming
programme.desc: Lead by Kevin Tsai and Dee Hsu, who never fail to entertain their audience by the fast-paced, humorous and fully self-aware hosting style. The discussions ranging from controvercial topics to gossip and current events. Moreover, surprises from the guests of the show often go beyond all your expectation that you don't want to miss out!

programme.title: Super Followers
programme.desc: Join Jacky Wu and Sandy Wu as they bridge generation gaps and co-host this programme that integrates intellectual interviews to present a unique and high-quality variety talk show!

programme.title: Hit the Headlines
programme.desc: Headline Talk Show is a political show co-hosted by anchor Zhou Yuqin and director of the political center Lin Jiayuan. Today's major current events can be seen in "Headline Talk Show"! Taiwan shouldn't just have only one voice, nor should Taiwan have only one color. "Headline Talk Show" is the most daring-speak-out TV show. We speak out your voice!

programme.title: Real or Fake
programme.desc: The topics cover a wide range-from trending current events to intriguing health issues-presenting both sides of the argument to the audience, debunking various misconceptions, and delving into little-known facts. Harnessing the power of the internet, the promotional impact spreads like ripples in water!

programme.title: Xiaomai's Health Notes
programme.desc: This as your health as the number 1 , all the 0 followed afterwards are all yours! But without health, without the number1, no matter how many 0 are added afterwards, it is still 0. How to avoid getting sick? How to get sick less frequently? How to recover faster? How to maintain a healthy life? "Xiaomai's Health Notes" specially collected all the easiest, most practical, cheapest and most efficient ways for all of you. A good day starts with "Xiaomai's Health Notes".

programme.title: Pass Through Con-Csi
programme.desc: Pass Through Con-Csi', which hosted by Hank Chen will take you to reminisce the laughter and tears of the 12 years of Con-Csi, as well as the unrevealed stories on front stage and back stages, and let Con-Csi continue to accompany everyone around.

programme.title: College Talk
programme.desc: In each episode, students from different colleges and backgrounds are invited to represent the new generation and take challenges of different problems. They speak what they want to speak the most, and do what they love the most. The topics are lively and critical.

programme.title: The Queen's Legendary Show
programme.desc: The Queen's Legendary Show, tailored by EELIN Entertainment for Li Jing, features a completely new style and incorporates elements of "time-travel costume" breaking away from the conventional framework of variety shows and bringing audiences a fresh and novel experience."

programme.title: New Wave Cuisine
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: New Wave Cuisine

programme.title: CTI News Live
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: Students Coming
programme.desc: Stay tuned to more great programmes on CTI TV.

programme.title: Keep The Faith! Give Applause!
programme.desc: With a lively and engaging style backed by thorough preparation, the host takes us into the inner worlds of people and places, revealing that no success ever comes easy.

programme.title: Turn Around to Love
programme.desc: This is a family talk show based on the truth, covering age 0-99 years old family issues, chatting easily about various life stories, and discovering love together!

programme.title: True Love Blog
programme.desc: Interviews with famous TV anchor Lulu Hsia. People share personal testimonies of how God carried them through some of the most difficult seasons of life. These lovely Christians are willing to share their darkest and weakest side of their lives to the public in order to bring the most beautiful blessings from heaven to everyone. Each of their witness is with blood and tears, which brought the most shocking transformation and the most profound truth.

programme.title: CTI TALK Online Forum
programme.desc: In 2024, CTiTV will launch a new online forum titled "Cross-Strait Permanent Peace: Masters' Dialogue Series." We have invited top-tier experts to explore the possibilities of permanent peace across the Taiwan Strait and to analyze the collective anxiety within the younger generation.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern - an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all...

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperor's plot once again.

programme.title: Tales of Larceny
programme.desc: Connecting all the antics of bosses, monks, beggars, and thieves is the slippery and sinuous efforts of three pickpockets so adept at their chosen skill that they can even trick three beauties of their underwear without missing a step.

programme.title: The Dancing Millionairess
programme.desc: Peter was a key dancer in a dance troupe and applied to be the chauffeur of a rich girl, Betty. When he is rumoured to be her lover, Betty is furious and goes undercover as a reporter to investigate the rumour. They fall in love in the process, and after putting Peter through many tests, they finally seal their love with a dance.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: Shadow Girl
programme.desc: A young swordswoman becomes invisible during the day and a monster at night after taking her grandma's pill. She ruined the wedding of a bandit chief's daughter using her powers and is hunted down by them for revenge. Will she escape the hunt?

programme.title: Fangs of the Cobra
programme.desc: Incredibly, the title serpent is not a harbinger of horror, but actually the film's hero. This virtuous viper sniffs out bombs, fights gangs, battles a baby-killing rodent and even takes on a duplicitous woman. This one-of-a-kind thriller will be applauded by reptile fans everywhere.

programme.title: The Reckless Cricket
programme.desc: Inspired by "Drunken Master", this kung fu comedy features a bumbling martial artist creating a cricket-style fighting arts to fight and defeat the different martial artists who have beaten him before.

programme.title: Tiger Killer
programme.desc: Wu Song is appointed as chief constable after killing a tiger with his bare hands when drunk. The wife of his brother Wu Da Lang, seduces Wu Song but gets rejected by him, and engages in an affair with a rich man. They poison Wu Da Lang when he finds out about their affair. To avenge his brother's death, Wu Song kills both of them.

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot...

programme.title: The Lark
programme.desc: Sixties pop star Carrie Ku plays the "Little Lark" in this romantic-drama of mistaken identity that is a treasure trove of some of the most popular Mandarin songs of all time.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlong's younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles...

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: The Hidden Power Of Dragon Sabre
programme.desc: Defeated villain Sung Ching Shu returns and starts a reign of terror, trapping a beautiful Mongolian Princess and mastering the "yin and yang combination" to become almost invincible. Only two swords held by two great swordsmen can stand in his way!

programme.title: The Singing Escort
programme.desc: Betty Ting plays Susan, a young woman hiding from her father by being a nightclub singer in Japan. Pop singer Chao Ke-jen (Lin Chong) gets permission from his boss to visit Japan, with the condition that he finds the boss's daughter. Boy finds girl, boy falls in love. But will the father approve?

programme.title: The Dragon Creek
programme.desc: This wuxia murder mystery film talks about a young girl whose father was ruthlessly murdered during China's early republican era. She has a list of villains who have been plotting against her father and together with her elder brother, the young girl sets out on a journey to hunt down the secret serial killer.

programme.title: Brothers from the Walled City
programme.desc: Two orphaned brothers growing up in Kowloon's Walled City - the place where people are forced to live with indecent businesses of sex, gambling and drugs controlled by triads - take very different life paths. Chin works at a cabaret but keeps away from sins, while Kang is drawn to the sleazy underworld. Are their destinies shaped by the "walls"?

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: A titular gang of misfits come together to protect a patriotic general from a scheming usurper. To this end, the unlikely heroes act as the general's escorts on a dangerous journey to a distant British consulate, beset by enemies and sinister Japanese interference along the way.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Lion VS Lion
programme.desc: The traditional lion dance has never looked so good as in Lion VS Lion which captures the most impressive sequences of lion dancing on film. Besides being loaded with enjoyable martial arts chicanery, film historians can revel because it's also the first film that clearly demonstrates the intricacies and differences between the traditional Northern and Southern lion dancing techniques.

programme.title: Moonlight Serenade
programme.desc: A sweet inn-keeper's daughter is witness to a perverted rape, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle. Can her true love rescue her in time? For this movie, the moonlight serenade is the sound of suspense, leading to more danger than most romantic dramas can handle.

programme.title: The Bully
programme.desc: For lovers of the Shaw's sumptuous production and martial arts expertise, this action adventure in the "Jackie Chan style" is a special treat. A persecuted waiter turns to a "drunken master" for help when a restaurant customer turns out to be a kung-fu harbinger of doom!

programme.title: Family Light Affair
programme.desc: Alfred Cheung Kin-ting returns to the screen with this seriocomic look at the clash of cultures which result when a Mainland Chinese peasant brings his family to Hong Kong. Family Light Affair, whose Chinese title literally translates as "City Lights", is the director/writer's warm-hearted memoir of street life back in the early 1980s, featuring an eclectic cast of pop music and kung fu stars who shine in their poignant roles.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun...

programme.title: The Mirror and the Lichee
programme.desc: The curious title in this Huangmei Opera romance refers to the two props that signal a happy beginning between a scholar and a local beauty. The scholar polishes mirrors so as to be closer to his love, who signals her approval by tossing him some lichees. From that point on the course of their love becomes rocky, complete with murder and suicide.

programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love Virtually
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Ye Shan's marriage hits the 7-year itch. He accidentally downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity," and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: The Long River
programme.desc: After a huge flood during the 15th year of his reign, the young Emperor Kang Xi conducts civil service examinations to recruit talented individuals to solve the problems plaguing the Yellow River, allowing the 24-year-old Chen Huang an opportunity to come to the fore.

programme.title: The Ingenious One
programme.desc: In the process of traversing the rivers and lakes after ten years of training, Yun Xiang (Chen Xiao) met Shu Yanan (Rachel Momo), a weird and intelligent woman and several others and gradually realized the warmth of friendship.

programme.title: Family By Choice
programme.desc: Three unrelated individuals - Jin Sanha (Hwang In Yeop), Yoon Joowan (Jung Chae Yeon), and Kang Haijoon (Bae Hyun Sung) - become family for each other due to changes in their respective families. Ten years later, the trio reunite, kicking off a youthful romance.

programme.title: Missing: The Other Side 2
programme.desc: 3 Gongdan is a village where the souls of missing deceased people gather. Meanwhile, the protagonists in the drama try to find the bodies of the missing and figure out the truth.

programme.title: Our Generation
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Lin Qile and Jiang Qiaoxi reconnect in high school after a childhood friendship and a lingering misunderstanding. As they navigate youth's ups and downs alongside their classmates, they grow through shared experiences and step into new horizons.

programme.desc: The birth of Bella and Edward’s child ignites forces that threaten to destroy them all as tensions build toward all-out war between the Cullens and the Volturi in the thrilling conclusion to the epic phenomenon.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S13
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S13
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: It is the Semi-Final of the 2025 series of The Masked Singer. Richard E. Grant joins the panel. Three masked performers will progress to the Grand Final but two losing semi-finallists will be unmasked.

programme.title: The Masked Singer U.K. S6
programme.desc: All will be revealed in the Final of The Masked Singer. The 3 finalists perform duets with characters from previous series. Danny Jones joins the panel. Will Dressed Crab, Pufferfish or Wolf be crowned the winner? Who is behind the mask?

programme.title: You Bake My Dreams Come True
programme.desc: In the season finale, the home bakers take on the most demanding bake of the entire competition - creating a sweet, delicious, show-stopping bakeshop display. One home baker will walk away with the $50, 000 grand prize.

programme.title: Katie Holmes Day
programme.desc: While the rest of the town prepares for the celebration of Toledo's annual Katie Holmes Day, Jack and Marissa plot to ruin the holiday pageant.

programme.title: Mercy, Part II
programme.desc: In the aftermath of Cobra Kai’s win at the Under 18 All Valley Karate Championships, Johnny questions his dojo’s philosophy and deals with a figure from his past. Daniel searches for the right way to respond to Cobra Kai’s dominance.

programme.title: Bombshell
programme.desc: Alec and his team come face to face with the man who was put away for the church bombing 20 years earlier. Marisa and Kylie work together to save Alec, Phoebe and Rizwan. Jace makes a critical break in the case that changes everything.

programme.title: Reciprocity
programme.desc: Alec and Marisa follow clues leading to the bomber behind the church explosion. Kylie secures an FBI interview but her knowledge makes her an asset. Phoebe and Rizwan uncover evidence revealing the truth.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 1
programme.desc: Bella and Edward find their lives in turmoil after discovering she is pregnant. It's not long before her health is suffering, while meanwhile the wolf pack suspect the child could be their downfall.
