programme.title: Yi's LiLi-est Fan
programme.desc: While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room…), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old who’s positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crew’s pursuits. When Everest doesn’t return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLi’s intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Qilin-mania
programme.desc: Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yi’s building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this "Qilin" isn’t an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: The Tangled Web
programme.desc: Tom and D’Angelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.title: The Next Big Sting
programme.desc: Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders rescue a wounded Speed Stinger and take it back to Dragon's Edge, unaware of the dangers that follow.

programme.title: In Dragons We Trust
programme.desc: After the dragons of Berk are blamed for an outbreak of crime, Hiccup is determined to find out what’s really going on before the dragons are exiled.

programme.title: Coronation of the Iron Goddess
programme.desc: When things don't quite go according to plan, Po and the Kids must rally with other allies to save the Empress and protect China.

programme.title: Norway Out
programme.desc: Odlulu is on the hunt for the Wind Key so she can use it as the world's greatest hair dryer. But the Wind Key is too powerful for Odlulu to handle, so Wally, Wenda and Whitebeard head to Norway to locate the key before Odlulu can find it. Luckily, Whitebeard is a master sailor and can guide the Wanderers through the fjords. Unfortunately, Whitebeard also gets majorly seasick.

programme.title: The Phantom Of Club Moist
programme.desc: King Julien finally realize his childhood dream of opening up a nightclub, only to find it's haunted by a masked phantom.

programme.title: Gran Day Out
programme.desc: When Gran moves into the cave with The Croods, she drives Grug nuts and embarrasses Eep in front of the first-ever group of cool kids.

programme.title: Lucky And The Deadly Blizzard
programme.desc: When a sudden blizzard hits Miradero, Lucky and Maricela must work together to save the town.

programme.title: Drillasaurs
programme.desc: Half dinosaur! Half construction truck! Full-on fun! Watch giant Ty Rux, his little buddy Revvit and the crew come face-to-face with evil D-Structs.

programme.title: Collection and Extraction
programme.desc: Team Voltron infiltrates a hidden Galra Space Station to investigate why Zarkon is attacking planets and siphoning the life energy from the universe

programme.title: Worst In Show/Belle Of The Gumball
programme.desc: Whiplash finds a perfect poodle moth to enter to compete in the show; Chet attends a gala with a rich snail after he's named "Handsomest Snail Alive".

programme.title: Hawaii Five No/Story Of J.J.E.F.F
programme.desc: The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Kitty Pirates
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it’s time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees
programme.desc: Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Daddy Daughter Day
programme.desc: Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn’t be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep’s traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn’t until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it’s time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Please Hold While We Connect You
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: Magma Comes to the Surface
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Eye'll Be Watching You / Sorry Not Sorry
programme.desc: Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Kitty Pirates
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it’s time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark
programme.desc: The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Longest Yardwork / The Girl Who Cried Goose
programme.desc: Donna plans a garden party for Rona, but the only problem is that her garden is overgrown and neglected. The team try to transform this jungle into a backyard just in time for the party. / Lula finds an angry goose on the loose, and Team Zenko need to get it out of the park before soccer camp starts.

programme.title: Double Finked
programme.desc: Magnus's nephew, Axel, arrives on the island and tells the Rescue Riders that he wants to join their team. But is he just a trickster like his uncle?

programme.title: Divewings
programme.desc: When sea-dwelling dragons called Divewings start attacking ships near the island, the Rescue Riders have to find out what's making them so upset.

programme.title: Best Friends Day / The White Whale
programme.desc: Pixie loves to ride the clouds, but she can't understand why Kelp doesn’t love it, too. If they don't agree on this, does that mean they're not best friends anymore? / Kelp helps Ollie fulfill his dream of watching the white whale migration.

programme.title: Shark and Pilot Fish / Theo
programme.desc: When shark and pilot fish are separated it’s up to Kelp, Scallop, Cruz, and Waverly to help them find each other again. / Scallop’s friend Theo finally comes clean on why he’s always rushing off.

programme.title: Boots
programme.desc: Jack Sprat steals enchanted boots from the Treasure House and triggers a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume San Lorenzo's treasure.

programme.title: Sword
programme.desc: Dulcinea pulls a magical sword from a stone and becomes enchanted with heroic powers; Puss must help her learn how to control her newfound strength.

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Flustering Mindless Woe of the Flushable Memory Wipes
programme.desc: After being made fun of for sitting in chocolate pudding, George and Harold go into hiding only to come back to find that everybody has forgotten who they are

programme.title: Lucky And The Super Amazing And Fun Cousin Julian
programme.desc: Luckys buttons are pushed when her seemingly perfect cousin Julian comes to visit but reveals himself to be a junior con man

programme.title: Lucky And The Harvest Hunt
programme.desc: Lucky takes part in a secret Miradero tradition a nighttime scavenger hunt

programme.title: Kitty Pirates
programme.desc: Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it’s time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many "lands" of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Play It Again, Tim
programme.desc: When Tim is forced to take piano lessons, he actually enjoys them and Boss Baby realizes that Tim is being brainwashed by his piano teacher, slowly turning Tim into an old man

programme.title: Research & Developments
programme.desc: Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Captain Underpants and the Strange Strife of the Smelly Socktopus
programme.desc: After Erica convinces them that being suspended is a great vacation, George and Harold pull off every prank they can think of in order to get suspended

programme.title: Game Nightmare
programme.desc: When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: What Goes Eep Must Come Dawn
programme.desc: After a crowverine gliding mishap, Dawn loses her confidence and tells Eep she's taking a break from adventures. Eep convinces Dawn to join her on one last adventure - climbing Grrr Mountain.

programme.title: Shack Attack
programme.desc: "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot "Qilin" and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season_x000D_1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: We Meat Again
programme.desc: After their intense battle against Mr. Lung, the Creature Brigade disbands, leaving Yi and Everest as the remaining creature helpers. But thanks to an inert - but magical - chunk of meat called Taisui that falls from the sky, Yi finds herself caught in a time loop, forcing her to return the meat to its rightful home before sundown. Meanwhile, Jin and Peng end up on their own creature mission of sorts. Eventually the crew reunites, and together they are able to return Taisui and end the loop.

programme.title: A Hair-ifying Night
programme.desc: Our crew heads out of the city to reconnect with nature at a once-popular campsite, now deserted and in ruins owing to the urban legend of Yeren: a huge, hairy man who escaped from clown school as the tale goes. After some campfire spookiness, the crew comes face-to-face with the actual Yeren, who turns out to be a benevolent, camouflaging creature. The crew and Yeren team up to rejuvenate the campsite and keep it from being shut down.

programme.title: Fire Escape
programme.desc: Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alex’s new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.title: Ride or Die
programme.desc: After a fight with her mom, Jun joins Tom on an adventure into the Fire Realm, where the knowledge of myths saves the day.

programme.title: Empty Fireworm Nest
programme.desc: When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms’ excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Research & Developments
programme.desc: Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: Captain Underpants And The Senseless Torment Of The Space Toilet
programme.desc: Inspired by their favorite TV show, George and Harold - along with Principal Krupp - blast off to outer space, where an angry toilet awaits.

programme.title: Sticky Business
programme.desc: Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phil’s perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Guy Time
programme.desc: When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: Follow the Lightning: Part 1
programme.desc: Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to D’Angelo and Alex.

programme.title: Total Nightmare
programme.desc: When Hookfang is drawn to a female Monstrous Nightmare, Snotlout tries to break them up before he loses his friend forever.

programme.title: Alvin & the Outcasts
programme.desc: Alvin and the outcast Vikings terrorize Berk, left defenseless without their dragons, and now only Hiccup can bring them back.

programme.title: The Invincible Armour
programme.desc: Po and the Kids are put to the ultimate test, and must use all their knowledge and skills in order to defeat The White Bone Demon.

programme.title: Shadows of Bali
programme.desc: Odlulu uses the Shadow Puppet Key to create her own living shadows. When her mischievous shadows run off with the key, the Wanderers learn the only way to reattach the shadows is to touch them with the key. So, with the promise of a puppet show, they lure the shadows to the puppet theater, where they launch an epic game of tag to recapture the shadows before sunset

programme.title: King Juli-End
programme.desc: King Julien is mistakenly diagnosed with Mad Horse Disease, leading him to believe he's going to die - and Uncle King Julien to try to reclaim the throne.

programme.title: School Of Hard Rocks
programme.desc: When teamed up with her new friend Lerk, Eep's competitive side takes over when she sets out to win the first-ever school hunting exam at any cost.

programme.title: Lucky And The Price Of Freedom
programme.desc: Grayson wrangles Spirit "fair and square" and sends him to auction in another town --and there is nothing Lucky can do to stop him!

programme.title: Volcano
programme.desc: Ty and Revvit bravely stay behind to build and save their crater from a nearby volcano eruption, but D-Structsdoesn't want them to succeed

programme.title: The Black Paladin
programme.desc: Voltron charges toward Zarkon's massive ship. When Shiro loses control of the Black Lion, the team must figure out a new way to defeat the Galra.

programme.title: Turbo Does Laundry Part 1/Part 2
programme.desc: An exciting two-part episode of connected mini-stories following the crew that ends with Silent But Deadly and Thora deactivating a stink bomb.

programme.title: 137 Hours/Stalks On A Plane
programme.desc: Smoove ditches the crew and gets trapped in a clubhouse; the crew goes to ridiculous lengths to beat each other in a radio station contest.

programme.title: Itty Bitty Blossom
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: Dollhouse Store Day
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a coin purse with kitty coins, it's Store Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy help out at all the different stores (Cakey's Bakery, Baby Box's Craft Emporium, Kitty Fairy's Flower Shoppe) to earn kitty coins and save up for a melodicat at the Grand Opening of DJ Catnip’s Music Store!

programme.title: Lucky And The Unbreakable Spirit
programme.desc: A wild horse Spirit and a soontobe city girl Lucky become friends in a frontier town

programme.title: Lucky And The Treacherous Trail
programme.desc: When Lucky gets wind of an advanced trail ride she decides to become the best frontier girl anyone has ever seen.overnight

programme.title: Everest Returns
programme.desc: Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi’s violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi’s music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Welcome Home, Everest!
programme.desc: While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi’s magic works, they notice that Everest isn’t looking too hot. In fact, he’s too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help.

programme.title: A New Bergen-Ning / Laugh Out Cloud
programme.desc: Poppy throws a party to urge the Trolls and Bergens to build friendship When Troll Village has a drought Cloud Guy offers to wash away the problem after some quality time with Branch.

programme.title: Two Party System / Fun Branch
programme.desc: Poppy discovers that Branch and Bridgets birthdays are on the same day and throws them both partiesBranch attempts to prove to the Snack Pack that he is fun.

programme.title: Spaceship
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a spaceship that takes off with a sleeping CatRat inside! Gabby, Pandy, and Kitty Fairy have to get the ship back into The Fairy Tail Garden before Floyd (who thinks it's the best kitty toy ever!) gets his paws on it!

programme.title: Gabby Gets The Hiccups
programme.desc: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures, but it isn't until CatRat scares the hiccups out of Gabby that they go away!

programme.title: Hamster Kitties
programme.desc: When 6 adorable hamster kitties get loose in the dollhouse, Gabby, Pandy and Baby Box head out to look for them. Along the way, Baby Box learns a lot about hamster kitties, which convinces Mama Box to let them live in the Craft Room.

programme.title: Kitty School
programme.desc: When Gabby unboxes a school notebook and lunch box, it's Kitty School Day in the dollhouse! Gabby and Pandy head to different classes held by the Gabby Cats to learn and live a day in the life of a student.

programme.title: Picture Perfect
programme.desc: Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: Gruff Around The Edges
programme.desc: When a distant cousin of the Twins named Gruffnut arrives on Dragon's Edge, Tuffnut tries to impress him, but Gruffnut may not be the hero he seems.

programme.title: It Takes Ahhh Valley Part 1 & 2
programme.desc: When the Croods return to Ahhh! Valley they find that the evil Brood family has taken over and Grug must work with fellow Valleyites to defeat them

programme.title: CJ Wooferbug/What Did I Miss
programme.desc: DJ is excited to give her niece CJ her own wooferbug for her birthday. But the wooferbug proves difficult to transport across Trolls Village. Will DJ be able to get it to CJ before CJ’s birthday party ends?/When Peppy takes an entire day to get a new haircut, he asks Poppy to fill him in on what he missed. What follows is a series of short sketches, as we explore an average day in Troll Village.

programme.desc: When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Please Hold for the Next Representative
programme.desc: Yi and the crew are overrun with pings from humans who are frustrated by creatures they now live alongside. Just when they think they’ve solved one issue, another springs up - and then that original one pops up again too! Meanwhile, we see an ominous pedestal of light progressively become more cracked with each fraught human-creature relationship. At her wits’ end, Yi accidentally hurts Peng, Jin, and Everest with her magic. She then notices Everest fading into nothing…

programme.title: Please Hold While We Connect You
programme.desc: In the wake of the previous episode, the magical creatures have all vanished and the world at large has gone gray. Desperate to fix things, the crew travels to the Magical Realm to confront the omniscient Great Watcher, who was a tempting offer for Yi. The kids manage to retrieve creatures, but being back in the human world is sapping them of their magical energy.

programme.title: Dr. Catastrophe
programme.desc: During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, D’Angelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: It Flies in the Family
programme.desc: Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Magma Comes to the Surface
programme.desc: The dragon riders must sneak a very sick Magma Breather into the ICARIS infirmary.

programme.title: Wrinkles & Stickles
programme.desc: After Turtleneck is captured by Frederic Estes, Boss Baby and Tim attempt to rescue her, leading them to the terrifying "fun house" at the town fair

programme.title: Bossa Nova
programme.desc: After Boss Baby is fired from Baby Corp;he attempts to navigate regular baby life in a Mommy/Daddy/Baby playgroup. Even worse;the playgroup’s other new member is Mega Fat;whose animatronic stuffie Wagby malfunctions and threatens the safety of the whole group. Meanwhile;Tim does everything he can to avoid doing his homework.

programme.title: The Museum Job
programme.desc: When the crowded bathroom situation at the local museum threatens baby love;Boss Baby leads his new team of playgroup babies on their first mission…and then their SECOND mission after a klepto baby in their group swipes a priceless artifact. In a continued attempt to avoid homework;Tim joins Boss Baby on his mission.

programme.title: The storm
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: A room for Grandma and Grandpa
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: The crazy barbecue
programme.desc: Four best friends have a secret: after school, they climb up to their hidden tree house. It contains a priceless treasure: books! Each day, the children tell one another stories, travelling to exciting fairy-tale worlds.

programme.title: The lucky star
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Plankton's Secret
programme.desc: 95% of the planet Terraqua is covered by its oceans. Corto, Arthus, Enki and Mouse make up the Tikis, a team from the idyllic archipelago of Nui. They have the firm intention of winning the ''Whale Cup'', the biggest drone race ever.

programme.title: Panic on Board
programme.desc: Api explains to Koro that she has discovered proof of Laeti's involvement in eric's accident. Unfortunately, Mouss overhears their conversation.

programme.title: A very special birthday
programme.desc: What do the hairy-nosed wombat, the k?k?p? and the saiga antelope have in common? They are all amongst the rarest animals on Earth. Audrey, age 7, shares her everyday life with them at a wildlife shelter that works to protect species threatened with extinction.

programme.title: Indiscretions and dragons
programme.desc: Flavie leaks a secret: she reveals that Zoe has stuffed her bra. Felix plays an intense game of Dungeons and Dragons with his friends and his mother.

programme.title: Cheating is bad
programme.desc: Tamia is a courageous young girl who does nothing without careful thought. She wants to be a mediator between parents and their children, a voice for those without one. Helped by friends Audrey, Sara, Yao and Cheick, she enjoys plenty of adventures, taking her young audience on a veritable journey.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: TV5MONDE, the global French language network, offers the best television programmes from France, Belgium, Switzerland and Canada.

programme.title: Victoire in Houlgate
programme.desc: Victoire, 10 years old, has cystic fibrosis. Passionate about classical dance, she also loves animals. In Houlgate, Clemence Castel takes the young girl to the zoo, to a shelter, and finally to meet one of her idols: the prima ballerina Marie-Agnes Gillot.

programme.title: The secrets of the world's narrowest skyscraper
programme.desc: It's only three years old and already an icon! The Steinway Tower in New York is the world's narrowest skyscraper. Located just a stone's throw from Central Park, it has 84 floors. Why the race for the most innovative tower? We pay a visit.

programme.title: A garden of diversity
programme.desc: In Oeschenbach, in the canton of Berne, 20 year-old Gabriel Hess, took over the garden behind his parents' house. He learned to garden whilst still at school. In addition to the rare and old varieties he propagates with care to ensure they are never lost, he also collects pelargoniums.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'Azur.

programme.title: Chef Pays
programme.desc: Cooking is a way of building bridges between countries and sharing cultural diversity. Starting with a typical ingredient from the French overseas departments and territories, the chef creates a unique dish.

programme.title: Marie-Dolores Mabuila (Democratic Republic of Congo)
programme.desc: After arriving in Brussels at the age of 2 with her family, Marie-Dolores Mabuila is now part of the Belgian federal police, where she confronts day-to-day racism. But this hasn't stopped her from working her way up the ladder and even winning the prestigious International Women's Leadership Award.

programme.title: Christophe Ribero

programme.title: Day 1 Afternoon Session (Table 2): R1-12 (Mark Williams vs Wu Yize)
programme.desc: The 2025 World Snooker Championship is a professional snooker tournament organised by the World Snooker Tour and will take place at the Crucible Theatre in Sheffield, England. The winner will receive £500,000 from a total prize fund of £2,395,000. Kyren Wilson is the defending champion and will attempt to to overcome the so-called "Crucible curse", under which no first-time champion has retained the title since the tournament moved to the Crucible Theatre in 1977.

programme.desc: The One Water Race is a professional race and created for the absolute best endurance racers in the world. programme.title: The Longest Day in Chang'an
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] As the city of Chang'an faces a major crisis during the eve of Lantern Festival, death row prisoner Zhang Xiaojing (Lei Jia Yin) is given a critical mission to save the city of Chang'an together with Li Bi (Jackson Yee) within twelve hours.

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Vengeance of the Bride
programme.desc: Eun Seo Yeon is not rich, but everyone knows she has a warm heart. One day, she discovers that the man, Kang Baek San, whom she calls 'father' is actually her real parents' enemy! She embarks on a revenge journey...

programme.title: Serendipity
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Jian Mingshu (Lu Yuxiao) loses her memory after falling off a cliff, which saves her from a massacre. Rescued by her love interest Lu Chang (Wang Ziqi), they journey to the capital for imperial exams. Facing challenges together, they fall in love.

programme.title: Lo And Behold
programme.desc: This story revolves around the Hung family, their working lives and friends, as well as the ghost that the family befriends!

programme.title: Love Virtually
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Ye Shan's marriage hits the 7-year itch. He accidentally downloads a virtual lover app and begins dating 'F'. Surprisingly, his wife is calm in the face of his "infidelity," and the trio begin a bizarre life under one roof.

programme.title: Coroner's Diary
programme.desc: [With English and Chinese subtitles] Qin Wan (Landy Li), the daughter of the minister of Dali Temple, relied on her superb medical and forensic skills to join hands with Prince Yan Chi (Ao Rui Peng) to solve unsolved cases and find the real culprit in order to vindicate her father.

programme.title: THE BIG INTERVIEW
programme.desc: Six Premier League Titles, Four League Cups, Two FA Cups, a Champions League medal and 96 caps for England. Few players can boast a footballing CV like Kyle Walker. After eight years at Manchester City and a year in Italy with AC Milan, Walker is back in the Premier League with newly promoted Burnley. This week, Walker sits down with The Big Interview to reflect on his time at the Eithad ahead of returning as a visitor.

programme.title: PL STORIES
programme.desc: Maya Yoshida quietly became one of the Premier League's most dependable defenders during his years at Southampton, but his influence reached far beyond the pitch. In this episode, we look back at Yoshida's journey from Japan to England's top-flight, his role as a leader for club and country, and the cultural bridge he helped build along the way.

programme.title: PL MOMENTS
programme.desc: Premier League legend Alan Shearer relives the ten biggest moments of his iconic career - from title glory with Blackburn to record-breaking goals at Newcastle. programme.title: Part 6
programme.desc: The series depicts the stories of Pompeii's citizens with the threat of Mount Vesuvius bringing chaos and destruction. Arbaces's machinations and the persecution of Christians add to the growing tension.

programme.title: Part II
programme.desc: Offering superior technology, the Visitors hide an evil beneath their alien faces. Earth's only hope rests with a small band of humans who are united in their effort to save the planet.

programme.title: The Protectors
programme.desc: A new police program has been formed to fast-track recruits to get them patrolling on the streets, and it's up to tough veteran cop SGT T.J. Hooker to do the job. Only he can train these inexperienced young recruits and bring peace back to the street.

programme.title: Persona
programme.desc: Mia Lorimer claims to have been raped in an attempt to hide being abused by her husband, Brett. Detective Benson gets Mia to confess to the abuse and sends her to a battered women's shelter.

programme.title: The Case of the Missing Will
programme.desc: A terminally ill man asks Poirot to be executor of his new will but is murdered before he can write it, and it is later discovered the old will has been stolen.

programme.desc: Offering superior technology, the Visitors hide an evil beneath their alien faces. Earth's only hope rests with a small band of humans who are united in their effort to save the planet.

programme.title: The Trial and Error of Aunt Clara
programme.desc: Samantha saves Aunt Clara from banishment.

programme.title: Three Wishes
programme.desc: To trap Darrin with another woman, Endora gives him three wishes.

programme.title: First Do No Harm
programme.desc: Frasier suspects that his gorgeous new girlfriend is just using him to get free psychiatric advice.

programme.desc: Offering superior technology, the Visitors hide an evil beneath their alien faces. Earth's only hope rests with a small band of humans who are united in their effort to save the planet.

programme.desc: Mia Lorimer claims to have been raped in an attempt to hide being abused by her husband, Brett. Detective Benson gets Mia to confess to the abuse and sends her to a battered women's shelter.

programme.title: We're So Sorry, Uncle Albert

programme.title: Natural Born
programme.desc: Dominic Santini's new employee has plans far more ambitious than his boss suspects when hiring him as a young helper in his company.

programme.title: I Remember You... Sometimes
programme.desc: Darrin gets into trouble when Endora gives him a perfect memory.

programme.title: Art for Sam's Sake
programme.desc: Eudora substitutes a masterpiece for one of Samantha's paintings.

programme.title: Now You See It, Now You Don't: Part 1
programme.desc: While using Mr. Bentley's telescope on Halloween, Louise thinks she witnesses a murder.

programme.title: The Adventure of the Italian Nobleman
programme.desc: Poirot investigates the murder of an Italian count who was also the employer of Miss Lemon's new boyfriend. He soon learns that the victim was being targeted by a blackmailer.

programme.title: The Secret Admirer
programme.desc: Mistakenly believing he's got a secret admirer, Frasier jeopardizes his new relationship by trying to double his pleasure.

programme.title: Now You See It, Now You Don't: Part 2
programme.desc: Pursuing her feeling that she may have witnessed a murder, Louise lands in deep trouble.

programme.title: The Streets
programme.desc: Hooker and Romano investigate a series of terrifying assaults on women by a Bible-toting assailant.

programme.title: Part III
programme.desc: Offering superior technology, the Visitors hide an evil beneath their alien faces. Earth's only hope rests with a small band of humans who are united in their effort to save the planet.

programme.title: PTSD
programme.desc: Detective Olivia is put to the test when s pregnant Jessica Crewes disappears from her post as a Marine, and is about to give birth to her rapist's child but she is found dead in the trunk of her car.

programme.title: Isn't It Romantic
programme.desc: Fearful of leaving ALF alone, Kate and Willie have been going out separately, which ALF takes as a sign of a troubled marriage. ALF enlists the help of the kids to give Kate and Willie a second honeymoon.

programme.title: Hail to the Chief
programme.desc: When ALF continually disrupts Kate's sleep to ask about the American political process, Kate gives ALF a civics lesson and then dreams that they are opponents in the Presidential election.

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: When the Ochmoneks' nephew Jake, a belligerent boy who has trouble communicating with anyone, comes to stay with them, they ask the Tanners for help in raising him. ALF discovers Jake's hidden talent.

programme.title: The Adventure of the Egyptian Tomb
programme.desc: After opening an ancient Egyptian tomb, members of an English-American museum expedition start dropping off like flies. Can it truly be the Pharaoh's curse? Poirot travels to Egypt to unravel the mystery.

programme.title: The Underdog
programme.desc: Poirot investigates when the cruel CEO of a chemical company is bludgeoned to death in his home after the company's formula for a revolutionary new synthetic rubber is targeted by a thief.

programme.title: The Crane
programme.desc: After rescuing a prisoner from execution by a dictator, the IMF has to find a hiding place so conspicuous it will be overlooked by police hunting the fugitive.

programme.title: Death Squad
programme.desc: Jim Phelps leads the IMF to aid one of its own members when Barney is arrested and marked for execution by a sadistic police chief.

programme.title: The Martyr
programme.desc: To keep a student congress from being used as a rubber stamp by a repressive premier, the IMF sets Phelps up for capture so he can betray Paris as a turncoat student leader.

programme.desc: Hawke and Santini must find a newly developed electronic device which was stolen by a group international thieves. With Airwolf they begin a perilous search to locate it before irreparable damage is done.

programme.title: Santini's Millions
programme.desc: When Dominic is flying Airwolf alone on a mission, he lands the helicopter to rescue a downed pilot and stands to inherit millions.

programme.title: A Gazebo Never Forgets
programme.desc: Samantha tells Aunt Clara she plans to get a bank loan in order to tear down the gazebo and build a rumpus room. At the park, Tabitha fancies another baby's toy elephant and twitches it over.

programme.title: Soap Box Derby
programme.desc: Samantha helps twelve year old Johnny Mills get his Soap Box Derby Racer to the practice area. Gladys Kravitz boasts that her nephew will sweep the local contests and go on to win the finals at Akron.

programme.title: Sam in the Moon
programme.desc: Darrin asks Samantha to join him in watching moon pictures on TV, but she replies she's already been there. Then Endora takes Samantha shopping in Tokyo.

programme.title: Ho Ho the Clown
programme.desc: Darrin is fired when Tabitha wins all the pries on a TV show.

programme.title: Retri
programme.desc: The SVU find themselves in unfamiliar territory when Doctor Raye Massey calls them in to investigate the case of a baby infected with AIDS. They discover that the baby had been prescribed ineffective vitamins by a doctor who runs a 'voodoo' medical practi

programme.desc: When a boy is lit on fire, the SVU investigates the malicious crime. Their investigation leads to one man to admit to hurting the victim and opens a new door for the detectives when he unveils a group of pregnant teenage girls.

programme.title: The Announcement
programme.desc: Jenny reveals to her parents that she is pregnant. However, George and Louise are initially upset because they discover that Jenny chose not to tell them.

programme.title: A Short Story
programme.desc: George is chosen "Small-Business Man of the Year."

programme.title: Louise's Old Boyfriend
programme.desc: Florence decides to impersonate Louise and the result is a three-ring circus. While Louise lingers, uncertain about keeping a 35-year-old date with her first boyfriend, Florence seizes the chance to be Mrs Jefferson and keeps it herself.

The alliance with the lowest total votes will see an entire team eliminated. A gripping battle of passion, teamwork, and perseverance unfolds among the brothers. Who will rise, and who will fall?

programme.title: Right up Your Alley
programme.desc: Right up Your Alley takes you on a delicious journey through bustling streets and hidden alleys. Taste authentic local delights, hear heartfelt stories, and discover the soul of the city in its most genuine form.

programme.title: The Pride of Hunan Cuisine 2
programme.desc: Get your taste buds ready to discover temptations in the form of great food in Hunan cuisine. Your appetite will be stimulated through the exploration of distinctive cooking techniques and the use of ingredients in Hunan cuisine.

programme.title: James' Going Places
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Woori The Virgin
programme.desc: Oh Woo-ri has vowed to remain a virgin until she marries and has avoided romantic relationships to maintain her chastity. However, during a routine medical exam, a terrible mix-up occurs, resulting in accidental artificial insemination.

programme.title: Mr Player
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: Freedom Travelers
programme.desc: Join a journey that breaks boundaries and opens hearts. From breathtaking landscapes to untold local stories, Freedom Travelers invites you to see the world through new eyes, where every step brings you closer to something extraordinary.

programme.title: Time Concert 3
programme.desc: Embark on an extraordinary musical odyssey with Time Concert 3. Celebrate enduring friendships through timeless melodies, voyage through the annals of the past, and become custodians of cherished memories alongside the artist!

programme.title: James' Going Places
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies in Taiwan!

programme.title: Perfect Match 12
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Mr Player
programme.desc: Get ready for some serious fun with one of Taiwan's most popular outdoor variety shows! Golden Bell Award-winning hosts Jacky Wu and KID travel all over Taiwan and other parts of the world alongside celebrity guests to compete in races and complete missions.

programme.title: The Fatal Raid
programme.desc: Twenty years after a tragic mission left scars and secrets, Inspector Tam and Madam Fong return to Macau with a new generation of Special Female Force team. But when a familiar face from the past resurfaces during a high-risk escort mission, history threatens to repeat itself.

programme.title: Hello, Saturday
programme.desc: Helmed by the ever-popular veteran show host He Jiong, this all-new variety show features celebrity artistes from China, Hong Kong and Taiwan participating in song and dance performances, games and more.

programme.title: Chinese Restaurant 9
programme.desc: Making its debut in Africa, this season the program sets off from Tangier, Morocco, an iconic hub along the Maritime Silk Road. Through Chinese cuisine, it bridges China-Africa cultures and reimagines traditional dining with a modern twist. Get ready for a vibrant summer culinary journey across Asia and Africa.

programme.title: Unchained Love
programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: Unchained Love
programme.desc: During the reign of Long Hua, Xiao Duo, a powerful eunuch in charge of the imperial court, plans a palace mutiny with the help of a tribute lady Bu Yinlou. What is the fate between the two?

programme.title: Perfect Match 12
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Woori The Virgin
programme.desc: Oh Woo-ri has vowed to remain a virgin until she marries and has avoided romantic relationships to maintain her chastity. However, during a routine medical exam, a terrible mix-up occurs, resulting in accidental artificial insemination.

programme.title: Blue Moment
programme.desc: This gripping drama centers on the looming threats of massive meteorological disasters and their impact on human lives. It follows the unwavering dedication of a Special Disaster Management team who armed with expertise and courage, risk everything on the front lines to save lives.

programme.title: Perfect Match 12
programme.desc: Perfect Match is a highly-rated large-scale dating variety show that connects eligible bachelors to bachelorettes in China. Be thoroughly entertained by the sharp and witty Meng Fei, one of the top hosts for shows of this genre, as he presents a unique and humorous approach to interactions between all the participants.

programme.title: Whatever You Want
programme.desc: An illegitimate daughter of a businessman gets three wishes from a genie, Bo. However, Bo's magical power is far from perfect, leading to much hilarity in this charming fantasy comedy.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddy's career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation...

programme.title: How to Choose a Royal Bride
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager has arranged for a Minister's daughter Qiong Yao, to become Emperor Kangxi's concubine. However, Qiong Yao escapes in pursuit of freedom in marriage and Kangxi is happy to not go through with the union. When Kangxi travels incognito to Jiangnan, he serendipitously encounters Qiong Yao, who disguises herself as a man...

programme.title: The Story of Woo Viet
programme.desc: Former Vietnamese veteran Woo Viet arrives a refugee camp in Hong Kong and meets his pen pal Quan. Subsequently, he encounters Shum Ching, with whom he attempts to flee to the US. However, the pair end up stranded in Manila's Chinatown, where at the hands of the local triads Woo becomes a hired killer, while Shum is forced into prostitution.

programme.title: Romantic Dream
programme.desc: Dino meets his dream girl Mandy and falls in love with her at first sight. However, she disappears suddenly and he only sees her again after nine years, when she is already married. To overcome the pain of losing his love, Dino finds a guru with supernatural power to make him meet Mandy in his dream.

programme.title: Cop Shop Babes
programme.desc: Island East Police Station headed by Madam Lui is known for its "Cop Shop Babes" as all the officers there are female. Two police officers, Beer and Satay, apply for an internal transfer to this station in order to approach the girls. It is at this time that the police receives a bomb threat - can they resolve the case?

programme.title: Let's Make Laugh II
programme.desc: Bodyguard Ah Sun is sent to protect his boss' son, only to meet and fall in love with his mistress, the gorgeous Joey. As love blossoms between the two, the powerful boss finds out and all hell breaks loose!

programme.title: 97 Aces Go Places
programme.desc: Hao Shi becomes the new triad boss after his father is killed by the pretty swindler, Ling. While professional gunman Drunken Gun is tasked to help Hao Shi take revenge, Ling is hunted by gangster Lei, from whom she has conned 2 million dollars. In the process, Hao Shi and Drunken Gun accidentally arrest Lei instead...

programme.title: Bullet and Brain
programme.desc: Nine years ago, two legendary criminals, Bullet and Brain, vowed not to kill and lie before they disappeared. Both now return for a mission - to protect the granddaughter of the triad boss. Can they succeed without breaking their vows?

programme.title: My School Mate, The Barbarian
programme.desc: Edward attends a new school which has a reputation for fighting. Student leader Stone, befriends Edward, but their friendship is tested when a local triad leader discovers that Edward comes from a wealthy family.

programme.title: The Medallion
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Eddie is hired by the Interpol to capture a human smuggling gang leader known as Snakehead. Eddie dies in an action to protect a sacred child from being kidnapped, but is brought back to life by the child's magical medallion, allowing him to finally kill Snakehead.

programme.title: The Eye 2
programme.desc: Joey looks to start a new life after a failed suicide attempt but finds herself pregnant and dare not tell her ex-boyfriend. At the same time, she realizes that a mysterious woman is stalking her and begins to hallucinate, leading to a nervous breakdown. Taking advice from an abbot, Joey decides to uncover the truth in order to protect her baby...

programme.title: Perfect Girls
programme.desc: Chi will inherit his dying grandfather's fortune with one condition - he has to be married in a month, otherwise the money goes to his uncle, Robert. Chi falls in love with Siu Siu, but Robert intends to stop them by sending Moraine to seduce Chi. When Moraine decides to marry Chi for money, Robert stops her and reveals their plot.

programme.title: Love in a Fallen City
programme.desc: Based on a novel of the same name by the famous novelist Eileen Chang and directed by the equally acclaimed director Ann Hui, this romance story depicts the challenging relationship between an introverted Shanghai divorcee and a cynical Malaysian playboy during the Japanese invasion of Hong Kong in the 1940s. Will the lovers be together in the end?

programme.title: Everlasting Regret
programme.desc: Adapted from an award-winning Chinese novel, the story follows the life of a legendary Shanghai beauty Wang Qi Yao from her glamorous to her simpler days. She stays true to her own way of life while surviving the constant betrayal of her men, and bears witness to the waves of change to her city from 1947 to 1981.

programme.title: New Police Story
programme.desc: Senior Inspector Wing is an elite in the police force but has been drowning his guilt in booze after his entire team was killed by the "Gang of Five" in a mission. A year later, a young rookie detective with a complicated background is assigned to partner Wing and manages to inspire him into action, as Wing vows to take down the gang.

programme.title: Justice, My Foot!
programme.desc: Stephen Chow plays Sung, a lawyer who uses any means necessary to help his wealthy clients escape the law. Sung retires to the countryside when urged by his wife, but when Mrs Sung encounters a woman whose husband's death has been covered up by corrupted officials, Sung returns to the court for justice to be served.

programme.title: Behind the Yellow Line
programme.desc: A fresh graduate, Paul, strikes up an acquaintance with a pretty young girl, Monica, on the metro. Monica is involved in a love affair with a married man while Paul is also pursued by a rich girl. When Paul vows his true love for Monica, she suggests playing hide-and-seek with him in the metro to decide if they are fated to be together.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: The Bride With White Hair
programme.desc: As Wudang disciple Zhuo Yi Hang confronts the Demon Palace, he reunites with Lian Ni Shang, the woman who once saved him, and their love reignites. Lian, a disciple of the Demon Palace, endures torment to be with Zhuo but is shattered when he accidentally injures her. A fierce battle between good and evil unfolds!

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Mun undergoes a cornea transplant to correct her blindness, but ends up gaining more than the gift of sight. She shockingly realises that she is seeing another woman instead of herself whenever she looks into a mirror. Recalling that things changed ever since her cornea was replaced, Mun vows to uncover the truth behind her strange vision...

programme.title: Mother VS Mother
programme.desc: Guan De Xing fell in love with Li Xiao Yun when he was young, but was opposed by his mother and had to marry Zhou Shen Yu. Since then, Li holds a grudge against Zhou. Unfortunately, the son of Guan and Zhou falls in love with Li's daughter, and as the two mothers meet, they start brawling again!

programme.title: Shark Busters
programme.desc: During the financial crisis, a vast majority of Hong Kong people experience difficulties in repaying debts. During this time, loan sharks use ruthless ways to force debtors to repay their loans and it is up to Officer Lee and his underground team to hunt down the head of this illegal organization.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Ma Wing Jing and his brother arrive in Shanghai to make their fortune. Befriending a powerful mobster Tam, Ma is given his nightclub when he saves Tam's life. Ma's fortune rises but he must overcome the corruption and violence to survive.

programme.title: Hong Kong Hong Kong
programme.desc: After moving to Hong Kong, illegal immigrant Mang has no choice but to live in cramped quarters with male migrants who abuse her. In order to attain Hong Kong residency and a better life, she agrees to marry a lonely old carpenter. After her marriage, Mang crosses paths again with her ex-lover, and the two develop a passionate affair...

programme.title: The Truth
programme.desc: Orphaned lawyer Raymond Lau once helped clear hooker Lan of murder charges, not knowing that Lan is his mother. When a corrupt cop blackmails Lan with Raymond's identity, she kills him out of desperation. When Raymond is enlisted again to defend Lan, he uncovers the secret that she has been hiding about their relationship for years.

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddy's lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Prince Charming
programme.desc: Chen Li Pin, the nerdy son of a business tycoon, and his friend seek love in Hawaii. Returning home in disappointment, they accidentally find themselves in a messy identity swap. It is at this time that Chen falls for a beautiful girl May, who thinks he is a company chauffeur...

programme.title: Strangers Online
programme.desc: When a 13-year-old girl goes missing and is found murdered, virtual evidence she leaves behind leads to two shocking arrests.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: Black Girl Missing
programme.desc: Companion piece to the movie Black Girl Missing. While the media goes into a frenzy over missing white girls, Black women's disappearances receive muted coverage and limited police resources.

programme.title: Jean Perera: The Beauty Queen Murder
programme.desc: When former Malaysian beauty queen Jean Perera was found brutally stabbed in 1979, the subsequent murder trial would capture and divide public opinion.
A man risks his life to save his wife during a home invasion; two convenience store workers defend their workplace; a hairdresser is put in an unpredictable situation; and more.
A prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate who holds a shank to his neck; a motorcyclist and his girlfriend are attacked in the street; a porch pirate is busted; and more.

programme.title: Canadian Lake Monster And More
programme.desc: A Russian man is attacked by a knife-wielding ghost. Two fishermen come face to face with a legendary Canadian lake monster. A team of ghost hunters encounter the harrowing ghost of a young girl.

programme.title: Andy (Part A)
programme.desc: Andy has worked odd jobs his entire adult life, and he considers himself an entrepreneur specialising in the reselling of scrap and junk.

programme.title: Parents Gone Bad
programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: Part 2 (B)
programme.desc: Bergen County (NJ) Chief of Detectives Robert Anzilotti continues his mission to tie Cottingham to additional murders and to get him to confess to more cold-case homicides.

programme.title: Fathers, Fists And Fights
programme.desc: From the perspective of the person being arrested, viewers get a firsthand understanding of what truly happens once the handcuffs are on and the justice system begins its process.

programme.desc: Kelsey's family knew something was amiss when their usually responsible and responsive daughter didn't respond to their texts while out running an errand.

programme.title: Kamryn Johnson
programme.desc: 9-year-old Kamryn Johnson is supposed to be at gymnastics class when her mother, Sheraton, receives a frantic phone call saying Kamryn is being held captive for ransom.

programme.title: Small Towns, Big Crimes
programme.desc: Undercover agents Lyle Kirian and Brian Townsend embed themselves in two different but equally dangerous worlds in order to investigate suspected local gang members and the Mexican cartel.

programme.title: Peace Love And Murder In Marin
programme.desc: A brutal double murder shocks Northern California's peace-loving and laid-back Marin County. With residents reeling, police chase an elusive killer through three counties.

programme.title: Killed For The Cash
programme.desc: When a Texas gas store owner, Subir Chatterjee, 58, is shot inside his cheque-cashing booth in 2002, detectives suspect his killer is someone Subir knew.

programme.title: Bound By Tragedy - Amber Dubois & Chelsea King
programme.desc: In February 2009, 14-year-old Amber Dubois vanishes while walking to school. A year later, detectives are no closer to finding Amber when 17-year-old Chelsea King disappears while jogging.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Murder
programme.desc: In the shadow of the Rockies, Carolyn Jansen, 43, is found dead, stuffed into a duct-taped container. Detectives have two suspects but no clear way to tell who is the killer.

programme.desc: A love triangle at the University of Florida results in the murder of a popular student. An undeniable digital trail leads straight to his murderer.

programme.title: Nia Wilson
programme.desc: Nia Wilson and her two sisters decided to take public transportation back home. But just minutes after texting their father, the sisters were brutally targeted at a train station.

programme.title: Sandi Nieves
programme.desc: In 1998, a fire in Sandi Nieves' home that started under suspicious circumstances led to her conviction for arson, the murders of her four daughters, and the attempted murder of her son David.

programme.title: In The Name Of Love
programme.desc: A couple is shot to death on their doorstep, and detectives have to track down the killer. In Louisville, a hearing-impaired man is stabbed in his doorway. And a woman's body is found in a trash can.

programme.title: Pay Me For My Name
programme.desc: A woman alerts police to a crime she's committing; a golf game leads one player to see red on the green; a man wants to get paid by police during a traffic stop; and more!
A murderous gang member starts a courtroom melee; a hit-and-run suspect tries to run from court; a murder suspect's mom screams at a judge; and more.

programme.title: Backslide
programme.desc: When a father of two is shot dead while driving, detectives must retrace his steps to figure out who killed him.

programme.title: Vengeful Shooter Or Protective Father?
programme.desc: A 68-year-old father shoots his daughter's boyfriend when the couple arrives at the family home. Believing his daughter is trapped in an abusive relationship, he fires three shots.

programme.title: Cold Ashes
programme.desc: A deadly house fire claims the life of a family, investigators suspect foul play, and it sends a mother on a decades-long crusade to find out what happened to her missing teenage daughter and best friend.

programme.title: Truly Lost
programme.desc: Gwinnett County Homicide investigates a parking lot brawl that leaves two young men shot dead, and could cost four others their lives in prison - though three of them never fired a shot.

programme.title: Boston's Little Girl Lost
programme.desc: When an infant's body washes up on the shores of Deer Island, Massachusetts, residents rally to find out who she is, and what happened to her. Their unprecedented solidarity gets nationwide attention.

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg's masterpiece follows a team of scientists on an island to witness real dinosaurs in a park, only to see everything go wrong when a storm hits.

programme.title: The Perfect Team
programme.desc: Onion worries his relationship with Apple is in jeopardy when a stray cat enters the picture.

programme.title: Tips
programme.desc: Apple and Onion have to find a way to ride the Hot Air Balloon which is in their town for one day only.

programme.title: Falafel's Fun Day
programme.desc: When Falafel decides to pack up and leave the city, Apple and Onion have to convince him to stay or they'll have to leave too.

programme.title: Apple's In Trouble
programme.desc: Apple is challenged to a fight by a grumpy Cheesesteak.

programme.title: 4 On 1
programme.desc: Onion's fear of crowds threatens his basketball team's success.

programme.title: I Wish I Could Stop Hurting
programme.desc: Ruby sets off to settle a longstanding family feud.

programme.title: Prank Yankers
programme.desc: Tamika's tries to impress two popular older girls.

programme.title: Mini Mentors
programme.desc: Sunny has to perform for his old school teacher and mentor.

programme.title: China
programme.desc: After reading an article about China growing as a global power, Michael decides China must be stopped before they take over the US. Everyone in the office complains about Dwight's building standards and Pam threatens to move Dunder Mifflin.

programme.title: Classy Christmas Pt 1
programme.desc: Michael could not be happier when Toby has to take a leave of absence and corporate sends Holly Flax to cover for him. Pam is forced to do a second Christmas party after Michael wants the party to be on the day Holly returns to Scranton.

programme.title: Hollywood On Set S1
programme.desc: Each week Hollywood On Set goes behind-the-scenes on three major movies in production, featuring action footage and interviews with filmmakers.

programme.title: Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom

programme.desc: Lumpus does the impossible! He convinces Lazlo that Camp Kidney is actually terrible!

programme.title: Whale Songs / Tell-Tale Scooter
programme.desc: Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir. // Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Lannie's Lights / Assembly Required
programme.desc: When another fishy tells Lannie that her lantern shark lights are too bright, she tries to dim her shine. // The Sharks order a new table and discover they have to built it themselves.

programme.title: Fancy Dress Party
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: The Museum
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go to the museum. Peppa imagines herself as a Queen in the King and Queen's room. George imagines being a big dinosaur in the Dinosaur Room.

programme.title: Very Hot Day
programme.desc: It is a super hot day, and all the mud puddles have dried up, so Peppa and George play in the wading pool.

programme.title: Chloe's Puppet Show
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit their cousin Chloe's house, where they put on a puppet show about a pig who snores a lot. Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig miss the show as they are too busy snoring.

programme.title: Daddy Gets Fit
programme.desc: Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Tidying Up
programme.desc: Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: The Playground
programme.desc: Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Daddy Puts Up a Picture
programme.desc: Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: The Seven Foods / The Perfect Portrait
programme.desc: The Barbababies think their food can make them change colours and shapes. They decide to find the right food for each of them. // Barbabeau lacks inspiration, he can't create anymore. The whole family helps by suggesting new subjects to paint.

programme.title: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention
programme.desc: During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub
programme.desc: Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! // When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky / Pups Save the Lost Penguin
programme.desc: Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky. // Chickaletta switches places with a Baby Penguin.

programme.title: Private Club / Green Algae
programme.desc: Barbabeau, Barbabelle, and Barbabright have built a treehouse. // Barbamama is determined to stop a foul pollution.

programme.title: The Invasion / Prank Day
programme.desc: Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. // Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Cafe Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder
programme.desc: Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Too Many Swipers / Bateo's Home Run
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Swiper re-join with his duplicates and make it to Grandma's picnic. / Dora and Boots help Bateo the Bat get to the baseball game in time to play.

programme.title: The Flying Contest
programme.desc: AJ is entering in the Axle City Flying Contest. But when Crusher sends him and Blaze away, they must get back in time for AJ to build his super-cool flying invention!

programme.title: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild
programme.desc: Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. The barbababies organize a treasure hunt for the twins and enjoy the great outdoors. // The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Fuchsia Ocean / Zero Waste
programme.desc: Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Shadowland / Medievel Tides
programme.desc: Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Finception
programme.desc: When Hank accidentally takes an important treasure from Swimmy Hall, he goes on a sneaky mission to set things right.

programme.title: Hum-Patrol to the Rescue! / Pups Save Morning Mountain Yoga
programme.desc: When Adventure Bay holds a raffle, a pair of nest-building seagulls snatch the winning prize. // A rockslide leaves Goodway, Farmer Yumi and Garby stranded on the side of a mountain.

programme.title: Pups Save Ryder
programme.desc: Ryder discovers Garby the goat stuck on a cliff edge! He attempts to rescue Garby but gets stranded and drops his Pup Pad!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp
programme.desc: After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Camping
programme.desc: Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: The Tree House
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Basketball
programme.desc: Daddy teaches the kids how to play basketball, and it is not long before they are good enough to take on a team.

programme.title: Horsey Twinkle Toes
programme.desc: There is much excitement when Mr Zebra delivers a package from Aunt Dottie for Peppa and George.

programme.title: Naughty Tortoise
programme.desc: Dr Hamster's pet tortoise Tiddles gets stuck up a tree - who is going to come to the rescue?

programme.title: The Mountain Eater / The First Day Of School
programme.desc: Barbapapa tells the Barbababies about his extraordinary encounter with a wolf. // Tomorrow is the Barbababies' first day of school.

programme.title: Going into the Wild
programme.desc: The Barbapapas are off to a new adventure... in the garden. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.title: The Mystery Bandit
programme.desc: When a mysterious bandit makes off with Blaze's metallic trophy, he must track down the culprit in this preschool whodunit!

programme.title: Zeg and the Egg
